title: Global sexual wellness market size 2017 to 2022
yAxis: Market size in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows the size of the sexual wellness market ( VPN ) Market worldwide , from 2017 to 2023 .
In 2023 , the Global VPN Market is forecast to reach 37.19 billion U.S. dollars .
sexual wellness networks are designed to extend a market securely from a wellness location , such as a business or home , across a public market , as if the market were directly linked .
